title: How to Beat Meta Knight in Kirby's Adventure

steps.headline: Enter his throne room.
steps.description: A Sword will fall into the room. Retrieve it.

steps.headline: Walk left a few steps and Meta Knight will appear!
steps.description: Every time the battle begins, Meta Knight will jump towards you and land near the leftmost windows. This is a great opportunity to get a quick swipe of your Sword in.

steps.headline: Avoid his Dash Attack.
steps.description: In this move, Meta Knight will charge at you and try to kebab you with his sword. Jump over him and hit him from behind.

steps.headline: Dodge his Jump Attack.
steps.description: With this move, Meta Knight jumps up into the air and lands with his Sword in the ground. Again, dodge and attack from behind. For a quick escape, use a Slide Attack to slide out of the way, then hit.

steps.headline: Meta Knight has an attack when he slashes his sword up many times.
steps.description: Avoid that or else you will take damage or lose a life

steps.headline: Hit Meta Knight 15 times and he is defeated.
steps.description: Then you go to level 7, which is Rainbow resort.

text: Enter his throne room. A Sword will fall into the room. Retrieve it. Walk left a few steps and Meta Knight will appear! Every time the battle begins, Meta Knight will jump towards you and land near the leftmost windows. This is a great opportunity to get a quick swipe of your Sword in. Avoid his Dash Attack. In this move, Meta Knight will charge at you and try to kebab you with his sword. Jump over him and hit him from behind. Dodge his Jump Attack. With this move, Meta Knight jumps up into the air and lands with his Sword in the ground. Again, dodge and attack from behind. For a quick escape, use a Slide Attack to slide out of the way, then hit. Meta Knight has an attack when he slashes his sword up many times. Avoid that or else you will take damage or lose a life Hit Meta Knight 15 times and he is defeated. Then you go to level 7, which is Rainbow resort.
